FAIL_TO_PASS: when negatable boolean flag not specified then value is true
when argument not specified then action argument undefined
when storeOptionsAsProperties() then command+command passed to action
should call action when there are no implicit conflicting options set
should allow default value with a conflicting option
when custom with starting value and argument not specified with action handler then action argument is starting value
when .action on program with optional argument via .addArgument supplied then action called
when .action on program with optional argument via .addArgument and subcommand and program argument then program action called
when .action on program with optional argument via .addArgument and subcommand and no program argument then program action called
when storeOptionsAsProperties(false) then opts+command passed to action
when .action on program with optional argument via .arguments and subcommand and no program argument then program action called
when .action on program with optional argument via .argument and subcommand and no program argument then program action called
when .action on program without optional argument supplied then action called
when action handler and unknown option after command-argument then option passed through
when .action called then command passed to action
when .action on program with optional argument via .arguments supplied then action called
when options in sub and program then optsWithGlobals includes both
when .action on program and no arguments then action called
when .action on program with required argument via .arguments and argument supplied then action called
should not throw error when conflicts is invoked with a single string that includes another option
